rpmList.pl -- Perl Script for Creating a RPM BOM File

Author: Mark S. Millard
Last Modified: May 31, 2000

NAME

rpmList.pl -- create a RPM BOM

SYNOPSIS

perl rpmList.pl [-p] package

DESCRIPTION

rpmList.pl dumps a bill-of-materials (BOM) listing for the specified package. The listing is in ASCII format. By default, the specified package should be an installed RPM package.

Options

-p - package is an uninstalled RPM package with a .rpm extension

DIAGNOSTICS

rpmList.pl returns non-zero if there are any problems with listing the RPM package.

EXAMPLES

perl rpmList.pl wz_toolroot-base-0.5-1

This example will dump a listing of the installed RPM package wz_toolroot-base-0.5-1 to STDOUT.

perl rpmDiff.pl -p wz_toolroot-base-0.5-1.i386.rpm > wz_toolroot.BOM
 
This example will dump the uninstalled package file wz_toolroot-0.5-1.i386.rpm to the file wz_toolroot.BOM.

 

SEE ALSO

InstallBuilder, rpmDiff
